# User Management API v2.0 - Specification

## Overview
Upgrade existing User Management API from v1.0 to v2.0 with enhanced security, better performance, and new social features. This is a major version upgrade that introduces breaking changes.

## New Features

### 1. Enhanced User Profiles
- **Feature:** Add comprehensive user profile management
- **Description:** Support for custom fields, profile images, social links, and privacy settings
- **New endpoints:** 
  - `GET /v2/users/{id}/profile`
  - `PUT /v2/users/{id}/profile`
  - `POST /v2/users/{id}/avatar`

### 2. OAuth 2.1 Authentication
- **Feature:** Upgrade from OAuth 2.0 to OAuth 2.1
- **Description:** Implement PKCE, remove implicit flow, add device flow
- **Security Enhancement:** Mandatory HTTPS, improved token security
- **New endpoints:**
  - `POST /v2/oauth/device/authorize`
  - `POST /v2/oauth/device/token`

### 3. Advanced User Search
- **Feature:** Add elasticsearch-powered user search
- **Description:** Search users by name, email, skills, location with faceted filtering
- **New endpoints:**
  - `GET /v2/users/search`
  - `POST /v2/users/search/advanced`

### 4. Real-time Notifications
- **Feature:** WebSocket-based notification system
- **Description:** Real-time user activity notifications, typing indicators, presence status
- **Integration:** Requires new WebSocket infrastructure
- **New endpoints:**
  - `GET /v2/users/{id}/notifications`
  - WebSocket connection at `wss://api.example.com/v2/ws`

## Breaking Changes
- **Authentication:** All v1 API keys are deprecated - must migrate to OAuth 2.1
- **Endpoint Changes:** User creation endpoint moved from `POST /v1/users` to `POST /v2/users/register`
- **Response Format:** All responses now include metadata wrapper
- **Rate Limiting:** New rate limiting structure (per-user instead of per-IP)

## Migration Requirements
Teams need comprehensive migration documentation including:
- API key to OAuth 2.1 migration steps
- Endpoint mapping from v1 to
